channel.title: Distopia #474
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Zgyj7Fn.png[/img][/center]
[center]Welcome to [b]Distopia![/b][/center] [center]Welcome to Distopia. Distopia is a [b]RuneScape Private Server[/b] that strides to bring back the good old days of [b]2007[/b]. Our main goal here is to make a [b]Server[/b] that not only brings back the good old days, but to let others have fun and remember the days. The Days they thought was the best. Unlike [b]Jagex[/b] who start to ruin [b]Rs2007[/b], We at [b]Distopia[/b] will be doing our best to make our players happy. Some ways we will be doing that is keeping the content strictly to 07(with some of our own twists). As well as listening to our members' suggestions on what they would like to see ingame.[/center]
[center]About the [b]Server:[/b][/center] [center][b]Distopia[/b] is starting with a scratch base(not our own) but a base I have had on my computer for some time now. I figured starting with a clean base would be a better way to go as we can write most of the content ourselves. Not only would that be a learning experience, But it would show our [b]Community[/b] we will not be leeching things. [b]Everything[/b] at [b]Distopia[/b] will be written by our team. We hope by doing this it will help us maintain a better community as well as let our programming side of us finally shine.[/center]
[center][b]Our Team![/b][/center] [center][b]Titanium_[/b] - Project Leader[/center]
[center]Official [b]Website[/b][/center] [center]Will post when a Global Mod approves our link.[/center]
[center][b]Credits[/b][/center] [center][b]Graham[/b][/center] [center][b]Blakeman(RuneSource)[/b][/center] [center][b]Scu11[/b][/center] [center][b]Vastico[/b][/center] [center][b]Velocity[/b][/center] [center][b]Miss Silabsoft[/b][/center] [center][b]Sir Sean[/b][/center] [center][b]Flame_(Server Name)[/b][/center]
[center][b][size=14pt]Media[/size][/b][/center] [center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hY0uxsE.png[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Mbnq8ka.png[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Uq2nvcr.png[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PLQphkV.png[/img][/center]
[center][b]Latest Updates[/b][/center] [center][b]Coming Soon![/b][/center]

item.title: Distopia #474
item.dc:creator: @Titanium1 Titanium_
item.description:
@Titanium1 wrote:

[quote=“Int Bauk, post:29, topic:533536”][quote author=Titanium_ link=topic=652330.msg4371526#msg4371526 date=1380800860]

are you handling the titles server sided?

in deed i am but it will not be affecting GPI because the titles only show when u right click a player. And the way that is happening is by myself adding another right click option.

sendInteractionOption(“null”, 1, true); // null or fight
sendInteractionOption(“null”, 2, false); // challenge = duel arena only
sendInteractionOption(“Follow”, 3, false);
sendInteractionOption(“Trade with”, 4, false);
if (player.getRights() == Rights.ADMINISTRATOR) {
sendInteractionOption("<col=ff0000><img=1>Admin", 5, false);

pulled that right from my source. So then again I dont think it would be bad to load it server sided.
[/quote]

if you’re doing this server sided, you’d have to get the player’s rights, then send the interaction option; which returns a value. this value will be equivalent to the title.[/quote]

Indeed thats how I am doing it. I make the title read off the “player Rights” unless its a pk/skill title. if its a pk title i do it by pk level which u gain a level every 50 pk points. (that was just an example) of titles outside of user rights.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

[quote=“Titanium_, post:21, topic:533536”][quote author=Vain_ link=topic=652330.msg4371448#msg4371448 date=1380764830]
are you handling the titles server sided?
[/quote]
in deed i am but it will not be affecting GPI because the titles only show when u right click a player. And the way that is happening is by myself adding another right click option.

sendInteractionOption(“null”, 1, true); // null or fight
sendInteractionOption(“null”, 2, false); // challenge = duel arena only
sendInteractionOption(“Follow”, 3, false);
sendInteractionOption(“Trade with”, 4, false);
if (player.getRights() == Rights.ADMINISTRATOR) {
sendInteractionOption("<col=ff0000><img=1>Admin", 5, false);

pulled that right from my source. So then again I dont think it would be bad to load it server sided.[/quote]

if you’re doing this server sided, you’d have to get the player’s rights, then send the interaction option; which returns a value. this value will be equivalent to the title.

Read full topic

item.title: Distopia #474
item.dc:creator: @Titanium1 Titanium_
item.description:
@Titanium1 wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:24, topic:533536”][quote author=Titanium_ link=topic=652330.msg4371526#msg4371526 date=1380800860]

are you handling the titles server sided?

in deed i am but it will not be affecting GPI because the titles only show when u right click a player. And the way that is happening is by myself adding another right click option.

sendInteractionOption(“null”, 1, true); // null or fight
sendInteractionOption(“null”, 2, false); // challenge = duel arena only
sendInteractionOption(“Follow”, 3, false);
sendInteractionOption(“Trade with”, 4, false);
if (player.getRights() == Rights.ADMINISTRATOR) {
sendInteractionOption("<col=ff0000><img=1>Admin", 5, false);

pulled that right from my source. So then again I dont think it would be bad to load it server sided.
[/quote]the context menus are built client sided, so why would you do that?[/quote]
I currently did that just to get it done and for me to remember I need to do that. By later tonight I will have a better system done. Yes it will still be like that but ill have a full class to handle the rights, title name, color, shadow, ect. But U are absolutely right though, they are indeed client sided and I might even take that into consideration to do it that way.

Read full topic

item.title: Distopia #474
item.dc:creator: @Titanium1 Titanium_
item.description:
@Titanium1 wrote:

[quote=“Strucker, post:18, topic:533536”][quote author=Titanium_ link=topic=652330.msg4371382#msg4371382 date=1380754608]

looking good mate. is it being a strict remake? or just i mean…
Will it have custom content and such?

Goal is 90% of a remake but it will have some of my own custom things in there to such as a few custom minigames, Loyalty titles(My own base), and a few other things.
[/quote]Im curious on how’d you handle the titles…[/quote]
basically for now(just to get them done) i made another sendoption. like where u would see the things like “trade with” and such i just added another option and did things like if
(player.rights == 2) {
sendoption6("<col=ff0000><img=1>Admin");
thats only temporary until I write a system based on user rights/loyalty points.

Read full topic
